doc:
Ronnie Brody https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ronnie_Brody 0 Ronnie Brody (6 November 1918 – 8 May 1991) was a British actor who appeared in many comedy television series and films. His film appearances included: A Funny Thing Happened on the Way to the Forum, Carry On Loving, Don't Lose Your Head, Finders Keepers, Superman 3 and The Beatles film Help!. His television appearances included: The Benny Hill Show, Hancock's Half Hour, Rising Damp, Dad's Army, The Sweeney (Episode 3, Series 3, "Visiting Fireman" - Garage Mechanic), Dave Allen at Large and The Goodies (episode "Punky Business"), Are You Being Served?, Hi-de-Hi! and Carry on Laughing. Ronnie_Brody ( 6_November_1918 – 8_May_1991 ) was a_British_actor who appeared in many_comedy_television_series_and_films . His_film_appearances included : A_Funny_Thing Happened on the_Way to the_Forum_,_Carry On Loving , Do_n't_Lose Your_Head_,_Finders_Keepers , Superman_3 and The_Beatles_film_Help ! . His_television_appearances included : The_Benny_Hill_Show , Hancock 's_Half_Hour , Rising Damp , Dad 's_Army , The_Sweeney_(_Episode_3 , Series_3 , " Visiting Fireman " - Garage Mechanic_) , Dave_Allen at Large_and The_Goodies_(_episode " Punky_Business " ) , Are You Being_Served ? , Hi-de-Hi ! and Carry on Laughing .
